features: Convenient Oven Rack Puller: Our 11-inch oven rack puller is designed to make it easy to pull out hot oven racks without burning your hands. Its ergonomic wooden handle provides a comfortable grip, ensuring a safe and hassle-free cooking experience.

Reliable Oven Rack Shields: Our set includes two 14-inch silicone oven rack shields that effectively protect your hands and arms from accidental burns. These flexible shields can be easily placed onto the oven racks, creating a barrier between the hot metal and your skin.

Versatile Compatibility: Our oven rack puller and silicone shields are suitable for various kitchen appliances, including kitchen ovens, toaster ovens, air fryers, convection ovens, and small countertop ovens. They are perfect for ovens with small openings, providing easy access to your dishes.

Premium Materials: The oven rack puller features a durable wooden handle that is resistant to heat and provides a sturdy grip. The silicone oven rack shields are made of high-quality silicone material, which is heat-resistant and can withstand high temperatures without melting or deforming.

Practical: With our oven rack puller and silicone shields, you can confidently handle hot oven racks without the fear of burning yourself. Their practical design and reliable performance make them essential kitchen tools for any home cook or professional chef.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Oven Rack puller，Easy to use, easy to push and pull, and don't worry about burning your hands

Each oven rack shield is 14 inches long to cover either the center section of your oven shelf where most burns occur or use two to cover the entire shelf. Easy to cut to size. Don't worry about that will interfere with pans going in or coming out of the oven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my mom as a stocking stuffer this Christmas. I honestly expected it to be one of those things that ended up in a drawer somewhere never to be used again... but it was not at all! After our festivities, our family went on to use both our oven and toaster oven to prepare a holiday meal. We probably used this at least a dozen times during that process. My mom raved about it! I could hardly believe it. What I thought was going to be a "filler" type item, was one of the best received gifts I gave all season! She actually had a much simpler version of one of these before, which I didn't know, but it wasn't as hefty and also didn't have a shape profile that was as effective. The deep notches in this one mean that the racks don't slip and the additional silicone rack covers still allow the device to easily pull the racks out. That's another thing I wasn't expecting - that she'd use the rack liners. They're simple silicone tubes that are made to simply cover the front portion of an oven cooking rack. I got this pack because it was cheaper than the others and I figured if the covers worked - bonus. Well, they did work and my mom loved those too.Point is, this is a simple object that just does it's task really efficiently. It's got two different notches to pull out racks, is hefty enough to hold without slipping, and then had a different notch to push the racks back in. Simple. Easy. Effective. It's not something I'd give as a gift alone as it's so simple, but for a stocking stuffer it absolutely won the day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works, but uncomfortable.
reviews.reviewText: The silicone guards for the oven door do work very well, and I would probably get this for those alone. I haven't actually tried to touch it, but I feel safer knowing if I do, it'll be mostly covered in something that won't hurt as bad as metal.Now, the puller - it works. It just is not comfortable to hold at all. This sounds like a small thing, but it's the kind of uncomfortable where you don't want to pick it up at all. The wood isn't entirely smooth - it isn't splintery, per se, but it feels like it could be, or may become so later. It is also flat. It's meant to be held in a specific direction, but it is flat in the opposite direction. It feels like holding a ruler in your fist. It makes it very difficult to use.Given that this also feels like an aid for a disabled or elderly person, and it's something used in and near an oven, the shape of the item should fit into the hand easily and be safer to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Some pieces are more helpful than others.
reviews.reviewText: I like the oven rack guards and have one on each of the racks. I do wish the guards were a bit longer or it came with four. However they do cover the most likely places that could burn you and they do help.I somewhat like the rack puller for checking on food when I need to stir or baste something in the oven but if I am pulling food out of the oven I already have pot holders so there is no need for a puller at that point. I don’t find the rack puller as useful as I thought I would but it also does work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Oven Safety Tools
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good set to have, as the wooden rack puller and the 2 silicone rack guards add to the safety of using your stove. The guards have a split that allows you to simply press them against the outer part of each of the oven racks. The puller is really great, in that you don’t have to touch the racks to pull them outwards to remove the hot dishes that are on them; just hook the puller from under the rack, and slide the rack towards you. You can also use it to push the rack back into the oven. If you want the guard for a smaller appliance, like a toaster oven, it’s very easy to cut to the length of that appliance. I recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Oven set puller and silicone edges
reviews.reviewText: It used to be that us bakers could identify each other in the market because we all had burns on our forearms from when we went to pull things out of the oven.Not me anymore with this wonderful set I found right here on Amazon!!How brilliant!The wooden tool is to pull the rack out of the oven, no need to shove your head in and ruin your hairdo, or burn your hands fixing the dish when it is so easy to pull out with this specially designed too!The ribbed silicone pieces are to cover the edges of your oven racks.In all, this is just a brilliant set, and great value for the money, and hughly recommended.Kudos to the inventor!And now no one will know me in the supermarket as a baker, except for what they see in my cart, no longer by any burns on my arms 🤣

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very heat resistant
reviews.reviewText: These are an absolute lifesaver, I didn't realize how often me and my family were burning ourselves on the edges of the racks. The rack puller is also wonderful, and does quite well whether you have the covers on the racks or not. You definitely have a wonderful amount of control when you're pulling out the rack, and it's very easy to push the rack back in with the top of the puller.
